00010             "username"  => false,
00011             "password"  => false,
00012             "database"  => false,

00014             "dieonerror"=> false,
00015             "showerror" => false,

00019     function __construct() {
00020         global $db_config;
00021         $this->settings = array_merge($this->settings, $db_config);
00022         if($this->settings["error_file"] === true) $this->settings["error_file"] = dirname(__FILE__)."/__mysql_errors.log";
00023     }
00024 
00025     function connect() {
00026         if (!$this->link) {
00027             $this->link = ($this->settings["persist"]) ? 
00028                 mysql_pconnect(
00029                     $this->settings["servername"].":".$this->settings["serverport"], 
00030                     $this->settings["username"], 
00031                     $this->settings["password"]
00032                 ) : 
00033                 mysql_connect(
00034                     $this->settings["servername"].":".$this->settings["serverport"], 
00035                     $this->settings["username"], 
00036                     $this->settings["password"]
00037                 ) or $this->error();
00038         }
00039         if (!mysql_select_db($this->settings["database"], $this->link)) $this->error();
00040         if($this->link) mysql_query("SET NAMES 'utf8'");
00041         return ($this->link) ? true : false;
00042     }
00043 
00044     function query($sql) {
00045         if (!$this->link && !$this->connect()) $this->error();
00046         if (!($this->result = mysql_query($sql, $this->link))) $this->error($sql);
00047         return ($this->result) ? true : false;
00048     }
00049     
00050     function nextr() {
00051         if(!$this->result) {
00052             $this->error("No query pending");
00053             return false;
00054         }
00055         unset($this->row);
00056         $this->row = mysql_fetch_array($this->result, MYSQL_BOTH);
00057         return ($this->row) ? true : false ;
00058     }
00059 
00060     function get_row($mode = "both") {
00061         if(!$this->row) return false;
00062 
00063         $return = array();
00064         switch($mode) {
00065             case "assoc":
00066                 foreach($this->row as $k => $v) {
00067                     if(!is_int($k)) $return[$k] = $v;
00068                 }
00069                 break;
00070             case "num":
00071                 foreach($this->row as $k => $v) {
00072                     if(is_int($k)) $return[$k] = $v;
00073                 }
00074                 break;
00075             default:
00076                 $return = $this->row;
00077                 break;
00078         }
00079         return array_map("stripslashes",$return);
00080     }
00081 
00082     function get_all($mode = "both", $key = false) {
00083         if(!$this->result) {
00084             $this->error("No query pending");
00085             return false;
00086         }
00087         $return = array();
00088         while($this->nextr()) {
00089             if($key !== false) $return[$this->f($key)] = $this->get_row($mode);
00090             else $return[] = $this->get_row($mode);
00091         }
00092         return $return;
00093     }
00094 
00095     function f($index) {
00096         return stripslashes($this->row[$index]);
00097     }
00098 
00099     function go_to($row) {
00100         if(!$this->result) {
00101             $this->error("No query pending");
00102             return false;
00103         }
00104         if(!mysql_data_seek($this->result, $row)) $this->error();
00105     }
00106 
00107     function nf() {
00108         if ($numb = mysql_num_rows($this->result) === false) $this->error();
00109         return mysql_num_rows($this->result);
00110     }
00111     function af() {
00112         return mysql_affected_rows();
00113     }
00114     function error($string="") {
00115         $error = mysql_error();
00116         if($this->settings["show_error"]) echo $error;
00117         if($this->settings["error_file"] !== false) {
00118             $handle = @fopen($this->settings["error_file"], "a+");
00119             if($handle) {
00120                 @fwrite($handle, "[".date("Y-m-d H:i:s")."] ".$string." <".$error.">\n");
00121                 @fclose($handle);
00122             }
00123         }
00124         if($this->settings["dieonerror"]) {
00125             if(isset($this->result)) mysql_free_result($this->result);
00126             mysql_close($this->link);
00127             die();
00128         }
00129     }
00130     function insert_id() {
00131         if(!$this->link) return false;
00132         return mysql_insert_id();
00133     }
00134     function escape($string){
00135         if(!$this->link) return addslashes($string);
00136         return mysql_real_escape_string($string);
00137     }
00138 
00139     function destroy(){
00140         if (isset($this->result)) mysql_free_result($this->result);
00141         if (isset($this->link)) mysql_close($this->link);
00142     }
